::Perndabot::

Perndabot nods at BrightBlade's answer, his eyes sliding downward as she 
raises her hands above her head agian. He jerks his eyes back to her face.

"Am I coming with you into their base, or are you going in alone?" he asks. 
He figured she would confirm the latter. A bot his size was not extremely 
useful for stealth, only for slagging others.

He almost frowns as his eyes start to slide downward again. He was having 
trouble keeping them on her face, so he looks forward, in time to see another 
tree and avoid it.
